items.title: MSW worker & handler scaffolding
items.notes: Worker bootstrap + centralised handlers covering uploads/generation/tasks/results/photos/feedback/payments/admin per spec

items.title: /start - upload init & probe
items.notes: Form now calls uploadInit/uploadProbe, caches session info for downstream pages

items.title: /gen-image - task create + polling
items.notes: /gen-image now mocks uploads:init -> uploads:probe -> generation/start and seeds queue status/session storage for downstream pages

items.title: /results/:taskId - gallery from API
items.notes: Reads MSW results, download/delete endpoints, syncs latest taskId

items.title: /feedback - API submission
items.notes: Uses submitFeedback + ErrorResponse parsing, handles 429 cooldown & Dev Harness states

items.title: Admin dashboards
items.notes: UI not yet wired to Stage2 admin APIs; still using static data

blockers.description: npm run lint / build blocked by missing next binary; wait for dependencies
